channel.title: How do i fix "Java is not recognised as an internal or external command on vista
channel.description: Well how do i fix it on vista? I have the right classpath and path i am 100 percent sure, so i can run clients and run my server?

item.title: How do i fix "Java is not recognised as an internal or external command on vista
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

click start propreties for my computer on vista, then click advenced system click environment variables,
then click add new variables
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Read full topic
